alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 01 at 2:31AM MST until December 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible over southwest Yellowstone National Park. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches possible. West wind could gust 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday through 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind will create hazardous backcountry travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lesser snow totals are expected over northern Yellowstone. Possible totals range from an inch or two around Mammoth to closer to 4 to 8 inches near Canyon and Old Faithful.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
